original: yac chīlaṃ rakṣiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,

original: yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,

original: yad vīryaṃ ārapsyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,

original: yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,

original: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena.

original: evaṃ carataḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir utpatsyate,

original: saced dānaṃ na dāsyāmi durgateṣu kuleṣūpapatsya na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
analyzed: saced dānam na dāsyāmi durgateṣu kuleṣu upapatsya na ca me sattva paripākaḥ bhaviṣyati na buddhakṣetra pariśodhanam na sarva ākāra jña tām pratilapsye

original: sacet chīlaṃ na rakṣiṣyāmi tisṛṣu me durgatīṣūpapattir bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: saced śīlam na rakṣiṣyāmi tisṛṣu me durgatīṣu upapattiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: na sattvaparipāko na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
analyzed: na sattva paripākaḥ na buddhakṣetra pariśodhanam na sarva ākāra jña tām pratilapsye

original: indriyāṇi me paribhetsyate mukhamaṇḍalaṃ me dhyāmībhaviṣyati,
analyzed: indriyāṇi me pari bhetsyate mukha maṇḍalam me dhyāmībhaviṣyati

original: yayā rūpasaṃpadayā bodhisattvacārikāḥ carataḥ sattvasahadarśane naiva niyatā bhaviṣyanty
analyzed: yayā bodhisattva cārikāḥ carataḥ sattva saha darśane na eva niyatāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na ca rūpasaṃpadā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na buddhakṣetraṃ
analyzed: anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau na ca rūpa saṃpadā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na buddhakṣetram

original: sacet kusīdo bhaviṣyati nemaṃ śakṣyāmi bodhimārgam anuprāptaṃ na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: saced kusīdaḥ bhaviṣyati na imam śakṣyāmi bodhi mārgam anuprāptam na ca me sattva paripākaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñataṃ pratilapsye,
analyzed: na buddhakṣetram pariśodhanam na sarva ākārajña tam pratilapsye

original: saced vikṣiptacitto bhaviṣyāmi nedaṃ śaksyāmi samādhim utpādayituṃ yena samādhinā

original: sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na me buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na sarvākārajñatām
analyzed: sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na me buddhakṣetra pariśodhanam bhaviṣyāmi na sarva ākāra jña tām

original: duṣprajño bhaviṣyāmi na śakṣyāmi prajñopāyakauśalena śrāvakabhūmipratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya  #
analyzed: duṣprajñaḥ bhaviṣyāmi na śakṣyāmi prajñā upāya kauśalena śrāvaka bhūmi pratyekabuddha bhūmim ca atikramya sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetram pariśodhya

original: ayuktam etad bhaved yo māṃ mātsaryavaśena dānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauḥśīlyavaśena
analyzed: ayuktam etat bhavet yaḥ mām mātsarya vaśena dāna pāramitām na paripūrayeyam dauḥśīlya vaśena

original: śīlapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vyāpadavaśena kṣāntipāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ kauśīdyavaśena
analyzed: śīla pāramitām na paripūrayeyam vyāpad a vaśena kṣānti pāramitām na paripūrayeyam kauśīdya vaśena

original: vīryapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vikṣepavaśena dhyānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauṣprajñāvaśena
analyzed: vīrya pāramitām na paripūrayeyam vikṣepa vaśena dhyāna pāramitām na paripūrayeyam dauṣprajñā vaśena

original: aparipūrayan dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyāmi sarvākārajñatāyām.
analyzed: a paripūrayan dāna pāramitām śīla pāramitām kṣānti pāramitām vīrya pāramitām dhyāna pāramitām prajñāpāramitām na niryāsyāmi sarva ākāra jña tāyām

original: evaṃ khalu kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikāṃś ca sāṃparāyikāṃś ca guṇānuśaṃsān pratilapsyate,
analyzed: evam khalu kauśika sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā dṛṣṭa dhārmikān ca sāṃparāyikān ca guṇa anuśaṃsān pratilapsyate

original: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
analyzed: yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: śakra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
analyzed: śakraḥ āha āścaryam bhagavan yāvat iyam prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām paridamana arthāya anunnāma arthāya ca pratyupasthitā

original: yathā punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāparidamanārthāyānunnamārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
analyzed: yathā punar kauśika bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitā paridamana arthāya anunnama arthāya ca pratyupasthitā

original: śakra āha: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaś ca  #
analyzed: śakraḥ āha iha bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ laukikyām dāna pāramitāyām caran buddhebhyaḥ bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaḥ ca

original: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ
analyzed: tasya evam bhavati aham dānam dadāmi buddhebhyaḥ bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ

original: śrāvakebhyaś ca sa kṛpaṇavanīyakārthena yācanakebhyaś ca sa tena dānenānupāyakauśalenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
analyzed: śrāvakebhyaḥ ca sa kṛpaṇa vanīyaka arthena yācanakebhyaḥ ca sa tena dānena an upāya kauśalena unnāmam gacchati

original: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
analyzed: evam bhavati aham śīla pāramitāyām carāmi aham śīla pāramitām paripūrayāmi sa tena unnāmam gacchati

original: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
analyzed: evam bhavati aham kṣānti pāramitāyām carāmi aham kṣānti pāramitām paripūrayāmi sa tena unnāmam gacchati

original: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
analyzed: evam bhavati aham vīrya pāramitāyām carāmi aham vīrya pāramitām paripūrayāmi sa tena unnāmam gacchati

original: jaya evāsya bhaviṣyaty akṣataś cānupahataś ca taṃ saṃgrāmam uttariṣyati,
analyzed: jayaḥ eva asya bhaviṣyati a kṣataḥ ca an upahataḥ ca tam saṃgrāmam uttariṣyati

original: asthānaṃ kauśikānavakāśo yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃs tatra saṃgrāme samabhirūḍho jīvitāntarāyaṃ nigacchen  #
analyzed: asthānam kauśika anavakāśaḥ yaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām su ādhyāyan tatra saṃgrāme samabhirūḍhaḥ jīvita antarāyam nigacchet  /

original: sacet punar asya kaścid eva śastraṃ vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śarīre kṣipet na tasya śarīre patiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: saced punar asya kaścid eva śastram vā kāṇḍam vā śarīre kṣipet na tasya śarīre patiṣyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā dīrgharātraṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā,
analyzed: tathā hi tena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitā vā dīrgharātram ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā

original: ātmanaś ca rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāni nirjitāni pareṣāṃ rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca rāga śastrāṇi rāga kāṇḍāni nirjitāni pareṣām rāga śastrāṇi rāga kāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni

original: ātmanaś ca dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca dveṣa śastrāṇi dveṣa kāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām dveṣa śastrāṇi dveṣa kāṇḍāni nirjitāni

original: ātmanaś ca mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca moha śastrāṇi moha kāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām moha śastrāṇi moha kāṇḍāni nirjitāni

original: ātmanaś ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca dṛṣṭi kṛta śastrāṇi dṛṣṭi kṛta kāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām ca dṛṣṭi kṛta śastrāṇi dṛṣṭi kṛta kāṇḍāni nirjitāni

original: ātmanaś ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca paryutthāna śastrāṇi paryutthāna kāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām ca paryutthāna śastrāṇi paryutthāna kāṇḍāni nirjitāni

original: ātmanaś cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca anuśaya śastrāṇi anuśaya kāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām ca anuśaya śastrāṇi anuśaya kāṇḍāni nirjitāni

original: imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya tāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatāṃ,
analyzed: imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya tām ca prajñāpāramitām bhāvayatām

original: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā saṃgrāmamadhyagatasya śastrāṇi vā kāṇḍāni vā kṣiptāni śarīre na nipatiṣyati.
analyzed: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā saṃgrāma madhya gatasya śastrāṇi vā kāṇḍāni vā kṣiptāni śarīre na nipatiṣyati

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika saced kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: sarvajñatācittena cāvirahito bhaviṣyati. tasya kaścid abhaiṣajyam avakiret kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadā copanāmayet,
analyzed: sarvajña tā cittena ca avirahitaḥ bhaviṣyati tasya kaścid abhaiṣajyam avakiret kākhordam vā kuryāt agni khadā ca upanāmayet

original: śastreṇa vā dadyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake cainaṃ chorayet sarvaṃ tat tasya na kramiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: śastreṇa vā dadyāt viṣam vā dadyāt udake ca enam chorayet sarvam tat tasya na kramiṣyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā, (ŚsP_II-4_24)
analyzed: mahā vidyā iyam kauśika vidyā yat uta prajñāpāramitā anuttarā iyam kauśika vidyā yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: niruttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: niruttarā iyam kauśika vidyā yat uta prajñāpāramitā

original: atra ca vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇeḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate. tat
analyzed: atra ca vidyāyām śikṣamāṇeḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā na ātma vyābādhāya cetayate na para vyābādhāya cetayate na ubhaya vyābādhāya cetayate tat

original: tathā hi so 'tra śikṣamāṇo nātmānam upalabhate na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ atra śikṣamāṇaḥ na ātmānam upalabhate na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate

original: na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate
analyzed: na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate

original: na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate na kārakam upalabhate na vedakaṃ upalabhate
analyzed: na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate na kārakam upalabhate na vedakam upalabhate

original: na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate.
analyzed: na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate
na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa jām vedanām upalabhate
na śrotra saṃsparśa jām vedanām upalabhate
na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa jām vedanām upalabhate
na jihvā saṃsparśa jām vedanām upalabhate
na kāya saṃsparśa jām vedanām upalabhate
na manaḥ saṃsparśa jām vedanām upalabhate
na an avara agra śūnya tām upalabhate
na abhāva śūnyatām upalabhate na svabhāva śūnyatām upalabhate
na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni upalabhate
na mārga ākāra jña tām upalabhate
na sarva ākāra jña tām upalabhate

original: anupalambhamāno nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate,
analyzed: an upalambhamānaḥ na ātma vyābādhāya cetayate na para vyābādhāya cetayate na ubhaya vyābādhāya cetayate

original: sarvasattvānāṃ cittāni vyavalokayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py atra vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyate udgṛhīṣyati na svādhyāpayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyate na yoniśo
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yatra imām prajñāpāramitām likhitvā dhārayiṣyate udgṛhīṣyati na su ādhyāpayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyate na yoniśas

original: tad anena te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
analyzed: tat anena te kauśika paryāyeṇa evam veditavyam

original: alpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā sattvā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā dharme abhedyprasādena samanvāgatā saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
analyzed: alpakāḥ te jāmbūdvīpakā sattvāḥ ye buddhe abhedya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ dharme abhedya prasādena samanvāgatā saṃghe abhedya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ
tatas alpatarakāḥ ye trayāṇām vimokṣa mukhānām lābhinaḥ
tatas alpatarakāḥ ye aṣṭānām vimokṣāṇām lābhinaḥ
tatas alpatarakāḥ ye nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattinām lābhinaḥ
tatas alpatarakāḥ ye catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām lābhinaḥ
tatas alpatarakāḥ ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām lābhinaḥ

original: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
analyzed: tatas alpatarakāḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ ye trayāṇām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ

original: tato 'lpatarakā ye rāgadvesamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
analyzed: tatas alpatarakāḥ ye rāga dvesa moha tanu tvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ tatas alpatarakāḥ ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt anāgāminaḥ

original: tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
analyzed: tatas alpatarakāḥ ye pañcānām mūrdhabhāgīyānām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt arhantaḥ

original: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
analyzed: tatas alpatarakāḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ ye pratyeka bodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ
tatas alpatarakāḥ ye anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ

original: tato 'lpatarakā ye bodhaye athyāsayena caranti niṣṭhatu kauśika manuṣyāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: tatas alpatarakāḥ ye bodhaye caranti niṣṭhatu kauśika manuṣyāḥ tat kim manyase

original: kauśika kiyanto jāmbūdvīpe prāṇināye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhino ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ  #
analyzed: kauśika kiyantaḥ jāmbūdvīpe prāṇināye saptatriṃśataḥ bodhi pakṣāṇām dharmāṇām lābhinaḥ ye trayāṇām vimokṣa mukhānām lābhinaḥ ye aṣṭānām vimokṣa mukhānām

original: anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr lābhino ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ.
analyzed: anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ lābhinaḥ ye catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām lābhinaḥ ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām lābhinaḥ

original: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāmino ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ  #
analyzed: kiyantaḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇinaḥ ye trayāṇām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ ye rāga dveṣa moha tanu tvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇām

original: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ kiyants te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ
analyzed: ye pratyeka bodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ kiyan te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇinaḥ ye anuttarāyām

original: samyaksaṃbodhau niṣkāṅkṣā buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau niṣkāṅkṣāḥ buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ kiyantaḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ

original: prāṇino ye mātṛjñāḥ ye pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ kule jyeṣṭopacāyakā dānāni dadati śīlaṃ
analyzed: prāṇinaḥ ye mātṛ jñāḥ ye pitṛ jñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ kule jyeṣṭa upacāyakāḥ dānāni dadati śīlam

original: anātmasaṃjñino 'śucisaṃjñinaḥ sarvalokeṣv anabhirati saṃjñanaḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
analyzed: anātma saṃjñinaḥ aśuci saṃjñinaḥ sarva lokeṣu saṃjñanaḥ kiyantaḥ te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇinaḥ ye anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ

original: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
analyzed: śakraḥ āha alpakāḥ te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇinaḥ ye saptatriṃśataḥ bodhi pakṣāṇām dharmāṇām lābhinaḥ
ye navānām anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām lābhinaḥ
ye rāga dveṣa moha tanu tvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ

original: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
analyzed: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt anāgāminaḥ

original: ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
analyzed: ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt arhantaḥ

original: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitā alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
analyzed: ye pratyeka bodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ alpakāḥ te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇinaḥ ye anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ

original: alpakās te kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
analyzed: alpakāḥ te kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇinaḥ ye saptatriṃśataḥ bodhi pakṣāṇām dharmāṇām lābhinaḥ

original: ye navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
analyzed: ye navānām anupūrva vihāra samāpattīnām lābhinaḥ ye catasṛṇām pratisaṃvidām lābhinaḥ ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām lābhinaḥ
ye rāga dveṣa moha tanu tvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ

original: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmino ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
analyzed: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt anāgāminaḥ ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānām saṃyojanānām prahāṇāt arhantaḥ
caranti atas alpatarakāḥ ye anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhu kāmāḥ

original: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
analyzed: iha aham kauśika anāvaraṇena buddha cakṣuṣā pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmi aprameya asaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau  #

kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hīna adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhatuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hīna adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau  #
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā upāya kauśala virahitāḥ tatas ekaḥ vā dvau vā a vaivartya bhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yat bhūyastvena śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau
kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hīna adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau  #

kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hīna adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: prajñāparamitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe
analyzed: prajñāparamitā upāya kauśala virahitāḥ tatas ekaḥ vā dvau vā a vaivartya bhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe

original: te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya
analyzed: te yat bhūyastvena śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante tat kasya
kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hīna adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai  #
analyzed: iha aham kauśika anāvaraṇena buddha cakṣuṣā pūrvadakṣiṇasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmi aprameya asaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai

original: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau  #
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā upāya kauśala virahitāḥ tatas ekaḥ vā dvau vā a vaivartya bhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yat bhūyastvena śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau
kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hīna adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai  #
analyzed: iha aham kauśika anāvaraṇena buddha cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇa paścimāyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmi aprameya asaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai

original: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau  #
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā upāya kauśala virahitāḥ tatas ekaḥ vā dvau vā a vaivartya bhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yat bhūyastvena śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau
kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hina adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai  #
analyzed: iha aham kauśika anāvaraṇena buddha cakṣuṣā paścima uttarasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmi aprameya asaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai

original: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau  #
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā upāya kauśala virahitāḥ tatas ekaḥ vā dvau vā a vaivartya bhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yat bhūyastvena śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau
kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hīna adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
analyzed: iha aham kauśika anāvaraṇena buddha cakṣuṣā adhastāt diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmi aprameya asaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau  #
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā upāya kauśala virahitāḥ tatas ekaḥ vā dvau vā a vaivartya bhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yat bhūyastvena śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau
kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hīna adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
analyzed: iha aham kauśika anāvaraṇena buddha cakṣuṣā upariṣṭāt diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmi aprameya asaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhate yad bhūyastvena (ŚsP_II-4_36)
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā upāya kauśala virahitāḥ tatas ekaḥ vā dvau vā a vaivartya bhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhate yat bhūyastvena

original: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante tat kasya hetoḥ
kusīdaiḥ hīna vīryaiḥ hīna sattvaiḥ hīna adhimuktikaiḥ duṣprajñaiḥ

original: tasmāt tarhi kauśika ye te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kauśika ye te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: saṃprasthitās taiḥ kṣipraṃ sukhaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukamair iyaṃ

original: asamasameyaṃ vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: śakra āha: katamair bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: śakraḥ āha katamaiḥ bhagavan dṛṣṭa dhārmikaiḥ guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bhaviṣyati

original: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
analyzed: yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
analyzed: yaḥ hi kaścid kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati
yāvat na eka uttareṇa rāga śatena kālam kariṣyati

original: ye ca puna rājakulād upadravā bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: ye ca punar rājakulāt upadravāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
analyzed: saced kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām su ādhyāyan rāja kulam upasaṃkramiṣyati
na tasya te avatāra prekṣiṇām avatāram lapsyate
rāja putrāḥ ca rāja mahāmātrāḥ ca a lapitavyam maṃsyante

original: yathāpi tad asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyās tejonubhāvena sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
analyzed: yathā api tat asyāḥ eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ tejaḥ nubhāvena saced kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām su ādhyāyan rāja kulam upasaṃkramiṣyati

original: tam enaṃ te rājaputrā vā rājamahāmātrā vā priyavacanair ālapitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
analyzed: tam enam te rāja putrāḥ vā rāja mahāmātrāḥ vā priya vacanaiḥ ālapitavyam maṃsyante

original: tathā hi kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā sarvasattvānām antike maitracittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ karuṇācittaṃ muditācittam upekṣācittaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika teṣām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṝṇām vā sarva sattvānām antike maitra cittam pratyupasthitam karuṇā cittam muditā cittam upekṣā cittam

original: ebhiḥ kauśika dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā (ŚsP_II-4_59)
analyzed: ebhiḥ kauśika dṛṣṭa dhārmikaiḥ guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kula putraḥ vā

original: kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
analyzed: kula duhitā vā bhaviṣyati yaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: katamaiś ca kauśika sāṃparāyikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati,
analyzed: katamaiḥ ca kauśika sāṃparāyikaiḥ guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhavati

original: yad uta na jātu daśabhiḥ karmapathair avirahitā bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: yat uta na jātu daśabhiḥ karma pathaiḥ avirahitā bhaviṣyati

original: na caturbhir dhyānair na caturbhir apramāṇair na catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ,
analyzed: na caturbhiḥ dhyānaiḥ na caturbhiḥ apramāṇaiḥ na catasṛbhiḥ ārūpya samāpattibhiḥ

original: na ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir na smṛtyupasthānair na samyakprahāṇair na ṛddhipādair nendriyair
analyzed: na ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ na smṛti upasthānaiḥ na samyakprahāṇaiḥ na ṛddhipādaiḥ na indriyaiḥ

original: na balair na bodhyaṅgair na mārgeṇa nāryasatyair na dhyānair nāpramāṇair nārūpyasamāpattibhir
analyzed: na balaiḥ na bodhyaṅgaiḥ na mārgeṇa na ārya satyaiḥ na dhyānaiḥ na apramāṇaiḥ na ārūpya samāpattibhiḥ
na vimokṣaiḥ na anupūrva vihāra samāpattibhiḥ na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhaiḥ

original: nābhijñābhir na samādhibhir na dhāraṇīmukhair na tathāgatabalair na vaiśāradyair
analyzed: na abhijñābhiḥ na samādhibhiḥ na dhāraṇī mukhaiḥ na tathāgata balaiḥ na vaiśāradyaiḥ
na pratisaṃvidbhiḥ na āveṇika buddha dharmaiḥ virahitāḥ bhaviṣyanti
anyatra praṇidhāna vaśena sattvam paripākam kariṣyati
sa na kadācid aṅga vihīnaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: veṇukarakule vā puṣkasakule vā mauṣṭhikacaṇḍālaurānikasaukārikakuleṣu vā śūdrakuleṣu vā satatasamitaṃ dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato
analyzed: veṇukara kule vā puṣkasa kule vā mauṣṭhika caṇḍāla aurānika saukārika kuleṣu vā śūdra kuleṣu vā satata samitam dvātriṃśat mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ

original: yatra ca lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti tatra lokadhātuṣūpapatsyate,
analyzed: yatra ca lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti tatra lokadhātuṣu upapatsyate

original: na jātu bodhisattvābhijñābhir virahito bhaviṣyati. sa ākāṅkṣaṃ buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
analyzed: na jātu bodhisattva abhijñābhiḥ virahitaḥ bhaviṣyati saḥ ākāṅkṣam buddhakṣetrāt buddhakṣetram saṃkramiṣyati

original: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya sa buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati,
analyzed: buddhānām bhagavatām darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya sa buddhakṣetrāt buddhakṣetram saṃkrāman sattvān ca paripācayiṣyati

original: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā imāṃ guṇasaṃpadām ākāṅkṣadbhir iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgṛhītavyā dhārayitavā vācayitavyā  #
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kula putraiḥ vā kula duhitṛbhiḥ vā imām guṇa saṃpadām ākāṅkṣadbhiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavā vācayitavyā  /
sarva ākāra jña tā cittena ca avirahitena bhavitavyam

original: ta ebhir dṛṣṭadhārmikaiḥ sāṃparāyikaiś ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: te ebhiḥ dṛṣṭa dhārmikaiḥ sāṃparāyikaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: athānyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmaṃ nyāsīt.
analyzed: atha anya tīrthika parivrājakānām śatam upārambha abhiprāyāṇām yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāmam nyāsīt

original: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūd,
analyzed: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasya etat abhūt

original: idam anyatīrthikānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma,
analyzed: idam anya tīrthikānām śatam upārambha abhiprāyāṇām yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāmanti sma

original: ya nv ahaṃ yāvan mayā bhagavato 'ntikāt,
analyzed: ya nu aham yāvat mayā bhagavataḥ antikāt

original: itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā udgṛhītaṃ tat svādhyāyaṃ kuryāṃ,
analyzed: itas prajñāpāramitāyāḥ udgṛhītam tat svādhyāyam kuryām

original: yadi me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakām upasaṃkramya bhagavato 'ntarāyaṃ ca kuryuḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām.
analyzed: yadi me anya tīrthika parivrājakām upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ antarāyam ca kuryuḥ prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyām

original: atha śakro devānām indro yāvad bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyām udgṛhītaṃ tāvat svādhyāyaṃ karoti sma.
analyzed: atha śakraḥ devānām indraḥ yāvat bhagavataḥ antikāt prajñāpāramitāyām udgṛhītam tāvat svādhyāyam karoti sma

original: atha te 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavataṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya,
analyzed: atha te anya tīrthika parivrājakāḥ dūreṇa dūram bhagavatam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya

original: tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
analyzed: tena eva mārgena tena eva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
atha bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāradvatī putrasya etat abhūt

original: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yena me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
analyzed: kim atra kāraṇam yena me anya tīrthika parivrājakāḥ dūreṇa dūram bhagavantam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tena eva mārgena tena eva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ

original: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataś chāradvatīputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥ,
analyzed: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ chāradvatī putrasya cetasā eva cetaḥ

original: parivitarkam ājāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayataḥ śakreṇa sāradvatīputra devānām
analyzed: parivitarkam ājāya āyuṣmantam śāradvatīputram āmantrayataḥ śakreṇa sāradvatīputra devānām
indreṇa iyam prajñāpāramitā samanvāhṛtā tena ete anya tīrthika caraka parivrājakāḥ dūreṇa

original: tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ,
analyzed: tena eva mārgena tena eva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ

original: na hi śāradvatīputra eṣām anyatīrthikacarakaparivrājakānām ekasyāpi śuklāṅgaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: na hi śāradvatīputraḥ eṣām anya tīrthika caraka parivrājakānām ekasya api śukla aṅgam samanupaśyāmi

original: sarva ete 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakāḥ pratihatacittā upārambhābhiprāyā imāṃ parṣadam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃyante nāhaṃ taṃ śāradvatīputra samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: sarve ete anya tīrthika parivrājakāḥ pratihata cittāḥ upārambha abhiprāyāḥ imām parṣadam upasaṃkramitavyam maṃyante na aham tam śāradvatīputra samanupaśyāmi

original: sadevaloke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ yo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: sa deva loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa śravaṇa brāhmaṇikāyām prajāyām yaḥ asyām prajñāpāramitāyām

original: pratihatacitto vā upārambhābhiprāyo vā upasaṃkramen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: pratihata cittaḥ vai upārambha abhiprāyaḥ vai upasaṃkramet na idam sthānam vidyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi śāradvatīputra ya iha trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
analyzed: tathā hi śāradvatī putra yaḥ iha tri sāhasre mahā sāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā

original: devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devaputrā
analyzed: deva putrāḥ trāyastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ deva putrāḥ

original: brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmaṇa ābhaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā
analyzed: brahmakāyikāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ brahma pārṣadyāḥ mahābrahmaṇaḥ ābhaḥ parītta ābhāḥ apramāṇa ābhā

original: ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubbā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā
analyzed: ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubbāḥ apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhāḥ apramāṇabṛhāḥ

original: bṛhatphalā anabhrakā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devāḥ,
analyzed: bṛhatphalāḥ anabhrakāḥ abṛhāḥ atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ

original: ye ca śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye 'pi (ŚsP_II-4_61)
analyzed: ye ca śrāvakāḥ ye ca pratyekabuddhāḥ ye api

original: bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ udgṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ taiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitām udgṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi te prajñāpāramitā niryātāḥ sarvam.
analyzed: tathā hi te prajñāpāramitāḥ niryātāḥ sarvam

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra ye api te pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās
analyzed: buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: taiḥ sarvaiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā anuparigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
analyzed: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāḥ niryātāḥ te sarve

original: ye 'pi te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ
analyzed: ye api te dakṣiṇasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī valukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ
pratyekabuddhāḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: taiḥ sarvaiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā anuparigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
analyzed: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāḥ niryātāḥ te sarve

original: ye 'pi te paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ
analyzed: ye api te paścimāyām diśi gaṅgā nadī valukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ
pratyekabuddhāḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: taiḥ sarvaiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā anuparigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
analyzed: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāḥ niryātāḥ te sarve

original: ye 'pi te uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ
analyzed: ye api te uttarasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī valukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ
pratyekabuddhāḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: taiḥ sarvaiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā anuparigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
analyzed: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāḥ niryātāḥ te sarve

original: ye 'pi te uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ
analyzed: ye api te uttara pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī valukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ
sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: taiḥ sarvaiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā anuparigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
analyzed: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāḥ niryātāḥ te sarve

original: ye 'pi te pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ
analyzed: ye api te pūrvadakṣiṇasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī valukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ
sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: taiḥ sarvaiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā anuparigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
analyzed: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāḥ niryātāḥ te sarve

original: ye 'pi te dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
analyzed: ye api te dakṣiṇa paścimāyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvaka saṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ

original: devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ taiḥ sarvaiḥ iyam prajñāpāramitā anuparigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sarvākārajñātāniryātā ca prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

analyzed: paryavāpsyati yoniśas manasikariṣyati avirahitaḥ ca bhaviṣyati sarva ākāra jña tā cittena

original: tāṃś ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair
analyzed: tān ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpaiḥ mālyaiḥ

original: gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
analyzed: gandhaiḥ vilepanaiḥ cūrṇaiḥ cīvaraiḥ chattraiḥ dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ vividhaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati,
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika yaḥ hi kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām pustaka gatām kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati

original: tatra kauśika ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyai
analyzed: tatra kauśika ye tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ anuttarāyai

original: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ trāyastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇa ratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ

original: brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇa ābhāḥ parīttābhā
analyzed: brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ devāḥ brahma pārṣadyāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ ābhāḥ parītta ābhā

original: apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubbāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ,
analyzed: apramāṇa ābhāḥ ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parītta śubhāḥ apramāṇa śubbāḥ śubha kṛtsnāḥ

original: bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
analyzed: bṛhāḥ parītta bṛhāḥ apramāṇa bṛhāḥ bṛhat phalāḥ anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ

original: te tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācitvodgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
analyzed: te tatra āgatya imām prajñāpāramitām vācitvā udgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramitavyam maṃsyante

original: ye 'pi te śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ,
analyzed: ye api te śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ devāḥ abṛhāḥ atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ

original: te 'pi tatrāgamyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācitvodgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
analyzed: te api tatra āgamya imām prajñāpāramitām vācitvā udgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramitavyam maṃsyante

original: tatra kauśika ye daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyai
analyzed: tatra kauśika ye daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ anuttarāyai

original: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ trāyastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇa ratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ

original: brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇa abhāḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā
analyzed: brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ brahma pārṣadyāḥ mahābrahmāṇa abhāḥ parīttābhāḥ apramāṇābhāḥ

original: ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā
analyzed: ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhāḥ apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhāḥ apramāṇabṛhāḥ

original: ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā,
analyzed: ye api śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ devāḥ abṛhāḥ atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ
ye api tad anye mahā ojaskāḥ mahā ojaskāḥ devāḥ nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: te tatrāgamyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitvodgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar
analyzed: te tatra āgamya imām prajñāpāramitām vācayitvā udgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar

original: tatra kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
analyzed: tatra kauśika tena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā evam cittam utpādayitavyam

original: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu lokadhatuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās
analyzed: ye api te daśasu dikṣu lokadhatuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devaputrāḥ trāyastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ

original: tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā
analyzed: tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ devāḥ brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ

original: devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇa devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā
analyzed: devāḥ brahmapārṣadyāḥ devāḥ mahābrahmāṇa devāḥ ābhāḥ devāḥ parīttābhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇābhā

original: devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ,
analyzed: devāḥ ābhāsvarāḥ devāḥ śubhāḥ devāḥ parītta śubhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇa śubhāḥ devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ devāḥ

original: bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā,
analyzed: bṛhāḥ devāḥ parītta bṛhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇa bṛhāḥ devāḥ bṛhat phalāḥ devā

original: ye'pi te suddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā,
analyzed: ye api te suddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ devāḥ abṛhāḥ devāḥ atapāḥ devāḥ sudṛśāḥ devāḥ sudarśanāḥ devāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ
ye api tad anye mahā ojaskāḥ mahā ojaskāḥ devāḥ nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: ihāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgṛhītuṃ paryavāptuṃ vandituṃ pūjayituṃ tebhya
analyzed: iha āgatāḥ imām prajñāpāramitām vācayitum udgṛhītum paryavāptum vanditum pūjayitum tebhyaḥ

original: idaṃ dharmadānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu ta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācitvodgṛhya paryavāpya
analyzed: idam dharma dānam dattam bhavatu te imām prajñāpāramitām vācitvā udgṛhya paryavāpya

original: pūjayitvā vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramanti tasya punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya
analyzed: pūjayitvā vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramanti tasya punar kauśika kula putrasya

original: vā kuladuhitur vā ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devās
analyzed: vā kula duhituḥ vā ye iha tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ

original: trāyastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
analyzed: trāyastriṃśāḥ devāḥ yāmāḥ devāḥ tuṣitāḥ devāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ

original: devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā
analyzed: devāḥ brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ brahma purohitāḥ devāḥ brahma pārṣadyāḥ devāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ devāḥ

original: ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ subhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā
analyzed: ābhāḥ devāḥ parīttābhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇābhāḥ devāḥ ābhāsvarāḥ devāḥ subhāḥ devāḥ parīttaśubhā

original: devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā
analyzed: devāḥ apramāṇaśubhāḥ devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ devāḥ bṛhāḥ devāḥ parīttabṛhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇabṛhāḥ

original: devā bṛhatphalā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā,
analyzed: devāḥ bṛhatphalāḥ devāḥ abṛhāḥ devāḥ atapāḥ devāḥ sudṛśāḥ devāḥ sudarśanāḥ devāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ

original: ye 'pi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā devā (ŚsP_II-4_87)
analyzed: ye api daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ trāyastriṃśāḥ devāḥ

original: yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devā paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā
analyzed: yāmāḥ devāḥ tuṣitāḥ devāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ devā paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ devāḥ brahmakāyikā

original: devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
analyzed: devāḥ brahma purohitāḥ devāḥ brahma pārṣadyāḥ devāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ devāḥ ābhāḥ devāḥ parītta ābhā

original: devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
analyzed: devāḥ apramāṇa ābhāḥ devāḥ ābhāsvarāḥ devāḥ śubhāḥ devāḥ parītta śubhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇa śubhā

original: bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā,
analyzed: bṛhāḥ devāḥ parītta bṛhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇa bṛhāḥ devāḥ bṛhat phalāḥ devā

original: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā ḍevā akaniṣṭhā devās te dharmavareṇa
analyzed: abṛhāḥ devāḥ atapāḥ devāḥ sudṛśāḥ devāḥ sudarśanāḥ ḍevāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ te dharma vareṇa

original: guptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti. nāsya kauśikāvatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate
analyzed: guptim saṃvidhāsyanti na asya kauśika avatāra prekṣī avatāra gaveṣī avatāram lapsyate

original: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati,
analyzed: imam api sa kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā dṛṣṭa dhārmikam guṇam parigrahīṣyati

original: ye 'pi devaputrā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās te tatrāgantavyā maṃsyante,
analyzed: ye api deva putrāḥ anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ te tatra āgantavyāḥ maṃsyante

original: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe tasya ca kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā karmaṇe tasya ca kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā rakṣā āvaraṇa guptaye tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi kauśika te kulaputrā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇārthāya sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhārthāya pratyupasthitāḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika te kula putrāḥ anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ sarva sattvānām trāṇa arthāya sarva sattvānām hita sukha arthāya pratyupasthitāḥ

original: śakra āha: katham bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñāsyate,
analyzed: śakraḥ āha katham bhagavan kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā saṃjñāsyate

original: iha akaniṣṭhā devā āgacchanti. samantād daśa dig lokadhātubhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ vandituṃ namaskartuṃ satkartuṃ  #
analyzed: iha akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ āgacchanti samantāt daśa diś lokadhātubhyaḥ imām prajñāpāramitām vācayitum udgrahītum paryavāptum vanditum namaskartum satkartum

original: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udāram avabhāsaṃ saṃjñāsyate yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sthāpitā bhaviṣyati niṣṭhā (ŚsP_II-4_88)
analyzed: saced kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā udāram avabhāsam saṃjñāsyate yatra iyam prajñāpāramitā sthāpitā bhaviṣyati niṣṭhā

original: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā gantavyā maheśākhyamāheśākhyā maharddhikā mahānubhāvā
analyzed: tena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā gantavyā maheśākhya māheśākhyā maharddhikā mahā anubhāvā

original: mahaujaskā iha devatā āgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ
analyzed: mahā ojaskāḥ iha devatāḥ āgatāḥ imām prajñāpāramitām vācayitum udgrahītum paryavāptum

original: vandituṃ namaskartuṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum.
analyzed: vanditum namaskartum satkartum gurukartum mānayitum pūjayitum

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamācāro bhavati tasya
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika saced kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā caukṣa samācāraḥ bhavati tasya

original: tayā caukṣasamācāratayā devatā āgamyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitvodgṛhya paryavāpya
analyzed: tayā caukṣa samācāra tayā devatāḥ āgamya imām prajñāpāramitām vācayitvā udgṛhya paryavāpya

original: satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā ātta manaskā bhaviṣyati

original: yāś ca tatra pradeśo alpaśākhyadevatā adhyuṣitā bhaviṣyanti tās tatropasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate. tāsāṃ maheśākhyānāṃ devātānāṃ tejaś ca śriyaṃ  #
analyzed: yāḥ ca tatra pradeśaḥ alpa śākhya devatāḥ adhyuṣitāḥ bhaviṣyanti tāḥ tatra upasaṃkramitavyam maṃsyate tāsām maheśākhyānām devātānām tejaḥ ca śriyam

original: yathā yathā maheśākhyamaheśākhyā maharddhikā mahānubhāvā devatā upasaṃkramitavyā maṃsyate,
analyzed: yathā yathā maheśākhya maheśākhyāḥ maharddhikāḥ mahā anubhāvāḥ devatāḥ upasaṃkramitavyāḥ maṃsyate

original: tathā tathā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udārādhimuktiko bhaviṣyati. tasya ca sthānasya samantād acaukṣasamudācāratā na pracārayitavyā,
analyzed: tathā tathā sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā udāra adhimuktikaḥ bhaviṣyati tasya ca sthānasya samantāt acaukṣa samudācāra tā na pracārayitavyā

original: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe gandhodakāvasiktaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ kartavyaḥ puṣpagandhāvakīrṇagandhaghaṭikānidhūpitaḥ,
analyzed: tena kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā karmaṇe gandha udaka avasiktaḥ sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ kartavyaḥ puṣpa gandha avakīrṇa gandha ghaṭikā nidhūpitaḥ

original: avasaktapaṭṭadāmācailavitānavitato netrapracāraṃ ca tat sa pṛthivīpradeśo 'laṃkartavyaḥ.
analyzed: avasakta paṭṭadāmā caila vitāna vitataḥ netra pracāram ca tat sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ alaṃkartavyaḥ

original: na punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kāyaklamatho bhaviṣyati kāyasukhatāṃ
analyzed: na punar kauśika kula putrasya vā kula duhituḥ vā kāya klamathaḥ bhaviṣyati kāya sukha tām

original: ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñāsyate. kāyalaghutāṃ ca kāyakathanīyataṃ ca cittasukhatāṃ
analyzed: ca kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā saṃjñāsyate kāya laghu tām ca citta sukha tām

original: ca sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñāsyate cittalaghutāṃ ca cittakam athanīyatāṃ
analyzed: ca sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā saṃjñāsyate citta laghu tām ca cittakam

original: ca tataḥ sa rātrau śayyāṃ kalpayantīmām eva prajñāpāramitām aśayeṇādhimuñcan na pāpakān
analyzed: ca tatas sa rātrau śayyām kalpayantī imām eva prajñāpāramitām aśayeṇa adhimuñcan na pāpakān

original: svapnān drakṣati sa paśyaṃs tathāgatam evārhantan samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ drakṣyati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: svapnān drakṣati sa paśyan tathāgatam eva arhantan samyaksaṃbuddham drakṣyati dvātriṃśat mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇaiḥ
samanvagatam aśīti anuvyañjanaiḥ samalaṃkṛta suvarṇa varṇena kāyena bhikṣu saṃgha parivṛtam

original: bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayataṃ tasya ca tathāgatasyāntikād dharmaṃ śroṣyati,
analyzed: bodhisattva gaṇa puraskṛtam dharmam deśayatam tasya ca tathāgatasya antikāt dharmam śroṣyati

original: yad uta dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām.

original: sa sukham eva śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati sukhaṃ ca prativibhotsyate srotaprakṣiptaś cāsya kāyo bhhaviṣyati,

analyzed: mṛddhī ca asya āhāra saṃjñā bhaviṣyati mṛddhī cīvara saṃjñā bhaviṣyati mṛddhī glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāram saṃjñā bhaviṣyati

original: evam eva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na bakavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. sarvākārajñatācittena cāvirahitena bhavitavyāḥ.

original: atha cet sa kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgṛhīyān
analyzed: atha ced sa kauśika kula putreṇa vā kula duhitrā vā imām prajñāpāramitām na udgṛhīyān

original: na dhārayen na vācayen na paryavāpnuyān na yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tena kulaputreṇa
analyzed: na dhārayet na vācayet na paryavāpnuyāt na yoniśas ca manasikuryāt tena kula putreṇa

original: vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkartavyā gurukartavyā
analyzed: vā kula duhitrā vā imām prajñāpāramitām likhitām pustaka gatām kṛtvā satkartavyā gurukartavyā

original: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś cchattrair

original: evaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahujanahitāya pratipanno bhaviṣyati bahujanasukhāya pratipanno bhaviṣyati,

original: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati na tve vayaḥ samatād (ŚsP_II-4_95)
analyzed: yaḥ hi kaścid kauśika kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā puṇyam prasaviṣyati na tve vayaḥ samatāt

original: daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyakṣaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān yāvaj
analyzed: daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyakṣaṃbuddhān sa śrāvaka saṃghān yāvat
jīvam satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet cīvara piṇḍa pātra śayana aśana glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāraiḥ

original: parinirvṛtān tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ saptaratnamayān stūpākāryat,
analyzed: parinirvṛtān tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām sapta ratna mayān stūpākāryat

original: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiś patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
analyzed: tān ca yāvat jīvam satkuryāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpaiḥ mālyaiḥ vilepanaiḥ cūrṇaiḥ cīvaraiḥ chattraiḥ dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ vividhaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ

original: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayata:
analyzed: atha bhagavān śakram devānām indram āmantrayata

original: sacet tvaṃ kauśikemaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ pūrṇaṃ cūḍikāvabaddhaṃ tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ labhethā yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyeta,
analyzed: saced tvam kauśika imam jāmbūdvīpam pūrṇam cūḍikā avabaddham tathāgata śarīrāṇām labhethāḥ yat ca iyam prajñāpāramitām pustakam likhitvā upanāmyeta

original: śakra āha: sacen me bhagavann ayaṃ jāmbūdvīpaḥ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ
analyzed: śakraḥ āha saced me bhagavan ayam jāmbūdvīpaḥ pūrṇa cūḍikā avabaddhaḥ tathāgata śarīrāṇām

original: dīpeta yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyeta imām evāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: dīpeta yat ca iyam prajñāpāramitā pustakam likhitvā upanāmyeta imām eva aham bhagavan prajñāpāramitām

original: na me bhagavan tatra tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ nāpratyayaṃ nābahumānatā nāpy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgataśarīrāṇi,
analyzed: na me bhagavan tatra tathāgata śarīreṣu a gauravam na a pratyayam na a bahu māna tā na api aham bhagavan tathāgata śarīrāṇi

original: na satkartukāmo na gurukartukāmo na mānayitukāmo na pūjayitukāmaḥ,
analyzed: na satkartu kāmaḥ na gurukartu kāmaḥ na mānayitu kāmaḥ na pūjayitu kāmaḥ

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā niryātāni tāni śarīrāṇi tena tena tathāgataśarīrāṇi
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā niryātāni tāni śarīrāṇi tena tena tathāgata śarīrāṇi

original: satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjayante prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni śarīrāṇi
analyzed: satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjayante prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni śarīrāṇi
tena tāni tathāgata śarīrāṇi pūjāḥ labhante

original: yadāhaṃ bhagavan tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyaṃ divyaiḥ
analyzed: yadā aham bhagavan tathāgata śarīrāṇi satkuryām gurukuryām mānayeyam pūjayeyam divyaiḥ

original: puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ divyaiḥ mālyaiḥ divyaiḥ gandhaiḥ divyaiḥ vilepanaiḥ divyaiḥ cūrṇaiḥ divyaiḥ

original: cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyais

original: vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.

original: tasya narakagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na tiryagyonir na yamalokagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
analyzed: tasya naraka gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na tiryagyoniḥ na yama loka gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā
na śrāvaka bhūmiḥ na pratyekabuddha bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā

original: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati tathāgatadarśanena sattvaparipācakena ca buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ
analyzed: yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate avirahitaḥ ca bhaviṣyati tathāgata darśanena sattva paripācakena ca buddhakṣetrāt buddhakṣetram

original: tāṃś ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayet pūjayet,
analyzed: tān ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayet pūjayet

original: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaih.
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ mālyaiḥ gandhaiḥ vilepanaiḥ cūrṇaiḥ cīvaraiḥ chattraiḥ dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ vividhaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ

original: punar bhagavan saced ayaṃ trisāhasro lokadhātuś cūḍikāvabaddhaḥ syāt tathāgataśarīraiḥ
analyzed: punar bhagavan saced ayam tri sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ cūḍikā avabaddhaḥ syāt tathāgata śarīraiḥ

original: pūrṇo yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvopanāmyate. anayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayor bhāgayor
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ yat ca iyam prajñāpāramitā likhitvā upanāmyate anayoḥ aham bhagavan dvayoḥ bhāgayoḥ

original: imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: imām eva prajñāpāramitām gṛhṇīyām tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ato niryātā hi bhagavans tathāgatās tāni ca tathāgataśarīrāṇi tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
analyzed: atas niryātāḥ hi bhagavan tathāgatāḥ tāni ca tathāgata śarīrāṇi tena tāni tathāgata śarīrāṇi

original: satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante yāni kulaputrāś ca kuladuhitaraś ca satkṛtya
analyzed: satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante yāni kula putrāḥ ca kula duhitaraḥ ca satkṛtya

original: gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā na durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ gacchanti. divyamānuṣīḥ saṃpattīr
analyzed: gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā na durgatim vinipātam gacchanti divya mānuṣīḥ saṃpattīḥ

original: anubhūya yathā praṇidhānaṃ parinirvāti. yadi vā śrāvakayānena yadi vā pratyekabuddhayānena
analyzed: anubhūya yathā praṇidhānam parinirvāti yadi vā śrāvaka yānena yadi vā pratyekabuddha yānena

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yac ca tathāgatadarśanaṃ yac ca prajñāpāramitāyā darśanaṃ tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yat ca tathāgata darśanam yat ca prajñāpāramitāyāḥ darśanam tulyam etat tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ca tathāgataś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ca tathāgataḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas triṣu prātihāryeṣu
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan yat ca tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ triṣu prātihāryeṣu

original: yac ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai deśayet tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yat ca kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai deśayet tulyam etat tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ito niryātā hi bhagavan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti niryātāni trīṇi prātihāryāṇi.
analyzed: itas niryātāḥ hi bhagavan tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ iti niryātāni trīṇi prātihāryāṇi
itas niryātam sūtram geyam vyākaraṇam gāthā udāna nidāna iti uktaka jātaka vaipulya adbhuta dharma avadāna upadeśāḥ

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopamāṃ tathāgatān arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,

pūrva dakṣiṇasyām diśi tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
paścima uttarasyām diśi tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
sūtram geyam vyākaraṇam gāthā udāna nidāna iti uktaka jātaka vaipulya adbhuta dharma avadāna upadeśān

original: yac ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai
analyzed: yat ca kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai

original: deśayet tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: deśayet tulyam etat tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ito niryātā hi te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ito niryātā tāni
analyzed: itas niryātāḥ hi te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ itas niryātā tāni

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca te daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan yat ca te daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu

analyzed: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satkriyeran gurukriyeran mānayeran

analyzed: pūjayeran puṣpaiḥ mālyaiḥ gandhaiḥ vilepanaiḥ cūrṇaiḥ cīvaraiḥ chattraiḥ dhvajaiḥ

original: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. yaś ca prajñāpāramitā pustakaṃ likhitvā satkriyeta
analyzed: patākābhiḥ vividhaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ yaḥ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakam likhitvā satkriyeta

original: chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyais tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: chattraiḥ dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ vividhaiḥ ca vādyaiḥ tulyam etat tat kasya hetoḥ

original: ito niryātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ.
analyzed: itas niryātāḥ hi tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā imām prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati

original: saṃprakāśayiṣyati tasya narakagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na tiryagyonir na yamalokagatiḥ

analyzed: tathā hi sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā sthitaḥ a vaivartya bhūmau veditavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti

original: yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tāṃ ca likhitvā satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati puṣpair
analyzed: yoniśas ca manasikaroti tām ca likhitvā satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati puṣpaiḥ

original: mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś

analyzed: ca vādyaiḥ tathā hi bhagavan sarva bhaya praśamani sarva roga nirghātanīyam prajñāpāramitā

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati

original: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati
analyzed: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tām ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati

original: pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ

original: sa tebhyo bibheti. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: evam etad bhagavan bhavati yo rājaniḥśrito bhavati balavatiniśrito bhavati.

analyzed: evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni tathāgata śarīrāṇi pūjām labhate yat api bhagavan sarva ākāra jña tā jñānam tat api prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitam

original: tasmād ahaṃ bhagavann anayor dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyāt. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: yāvad ato niryātā tathāgatasya sarvākārajñatā yatra bhagavan grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu

original: yatra ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyate

original: tena tatra manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vāvatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate. sarve ca te anupūrveṇa parinirvānadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti,

original: trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ manyat amānyat anena yānena. evaṃ mahārthikā bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,

original: atra hi nāma bhagavaṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvānāṃ buddhasatyena pratyupasthitā buddhotpādo bhagavaṃs tatra lokadhātau pratikāṅkṣitavyā,

original: tad yathāpi nāma bhagavann anargho 'yaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,

original: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnam ebhir evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavet,
analyzed: tat ca mahā maṇi ratnam ebhiḥ evaṃrūpaiḥ guṇaiḥ samanvāgatam bhavet
yatra yatra tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyet
tatra tatra amanuṣyāḥ avatāram na labheran

original: yatrāmanuṣyagṛhītā stri vā puruṣo vā bhavet,
analyzed: yatra a manuṣya gṛhītā stri vā puruṣaḥ vā bhavet
tatra tat mahā maṇi ratnam praveśet

original: tataḥ so 'manuṣyas tasya mahāmaṇiratnasya tejo sahamānaḥ kṣipram evāprakrāman nāvatiṣṭheta

original: pittena vā dahyamānasya tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ śarīre sthāpyeta tad api pittam atigṛhṇīyāt

analyzed: pāta abhibhūte vā śarīre tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyet tat api vā tam atigṛhṇīyāt

original: śleṣmaṇāropastabdhe śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api śleṣmāṇam upaśāmayet sāṃnipātiko vā vyādhir bhavet,

original: vivardheta tad rātrau cāvabhāsaṃ kuryād uṣmakāle ca vartamāne yatra pradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
analyzed: vivardheta tat rātrau ca avabhāsam kuryāt uṣma kāle ca vartamāne yatra pradeśe tat mahā maṇi ratnam

original: sthāpyeta tat taṃ pradeśaṃ śītalaṃ kuryāt śītakāle ca vartamāne yatra pradeśe tan
analyzed: sthāpyeta tat tam pradeśam śītalam kuryāt śīta kāle ca vartamāne yatra pradeśe

original: mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpya na tat pradeśam uṣmaṃ kuryāt,

original: yatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ s sthāpyeta tat pṛthvīpradeśe nātyuṣmaṃ
analyzed: yatra ca pṛthivī pradeśe tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta tat pṛthvī pradeśe na ati uṣmam

original: nātiśītamṛdusaṃpannaṃ kuryāt yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta na
analyzed: na ati śīta mṛdu saṃpannam kuryāt yatra pṛthivī pradeśe tat mahā maṇi ratnam sthāpyeta na

original: tad anye 'pi ca vṛścikādayaḥ sarīsṛpāḥ prāṇino na tatropacaret. yā kācid bhagavan strī vā puruṣo vā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭho bhavet,

analyzed: ca kula putraiḥ kula duhitṛbhiḥ vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā

original: na tv eva jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na tu eva jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: sapta bodhyaṅgāni ārya aṣṭāṅgaḥ mārgaḥ catvāri ārya satyāni aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ
śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarva samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni

original: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,

original: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
analyzed: mahā maitrī mahā karuṇā mahā muditā mahā upekṣā anye ca aparimāṇāḥ buddha dharmāḥ vistareṇa upadiṣṭāḥ tat anena api te kauśika paryāyeṇa evam veditavyam

original: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
analyzed: yaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā prajñāpāramitām pustaka likhitām kṛtvā parebhyaḥ dadyāt paṭhanāya api lekhanāya api vācanāya api

original: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?

an avara agra śūnya tā prajñāyate

original: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet.  #

original: dānaṃ datata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi idaṃ dānaṃ dadāmy asmai dānaṃ dadāmi tasyaivaṃ dānaṃ dadato dānam eva sthāsyati na dānapāramitā
analyzed: dānam datataḥ evam bhavati aham dānam dadāmi idam dānam dadāmi asmai dānam dadāmi tasya evam dānam dadataḥ dānam eva sthāsyati na dāna pāramitā

original: śīlaṃ rakṣata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmīdaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmi tasyaivaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ śīlam eva sthāsyati na śīlapāramitā upalabhayogena,

original: tasyaivaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayataḥ kṣāntir eva sthāsyati na kṣāntipāramitām upalambhayogena,

original: dhyānāni samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadya imāni dhyānāni samāpadyetasyaivaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānāny eva sthāsyati  #
analyzed: dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya evam bhavati aham dhyānāni samāpadye imāni dhyānāni samāpadi etasya evam dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānāni eva sthāsyati  /

original: prajñāṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmīmāṃ bhāvayāmi tasyaivaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñaiva sthāsyati na prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena.
analyzed: prajñām bhāvayataḥ evam bhavati aham prajñām bhāvayāmi imām bhāvayāmi tasya evam prajñām bhāvayataḥ prajñā eva sthāsyati na prajñāpāramitā upalambha yogena

original: tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
analyzed: tatra na saṃvidyate kutas punar nityaḥ vā anityaḥ vā bhaviṣyati evam upadiśantaḥ

original: kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: kauśika te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ vā na prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām upadekṣyanti

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca teṣām bodhisattva yānikānām kula putrāṇām

original: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: kula duhitṝṇām ca evam prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti ehi tvam kula putra prajñāpāramitām

original: bhāvaya mā ca pṛthivīdhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: bhāvaya mā ca pṛthivī dhātum anityaḥ iti samanupaśya tat kasya hetoḥ

original: pṛthivīdhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaḥ pṛthivīdhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: pṛthivī dhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ yaḥ pṛthivī dhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ saḥ abhāvaḥ yaḥ abhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā

original: tatra na pṛthivīdhātuḥ nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. pṛthivīdhātur eva tatra
analyzed: tatra na pṛthivī dhātuḥ nityaḥ iti vā anityaḥ iti vā upalabhyate pṛthivī dhātuḥ eva tatra

original: ṣaḍāyatanam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: ṣaṣ āyatanam eva tatra na saṃvidyate kutas punar nityam vā anityam vā bhaviṣyati

original: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā na prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām upadekṣyanti

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca teṣām bodhisattva yānikānām kula putrāṇām

original: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: kula duhitṝṇām ca evam prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti ehi tvam kula putra prajñāpāramitām

original: bhāvaya mā ca sparśam anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: bhāvaya mā ca sparśam anityaḥ iti samanupaśya tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sparśasvabhāvena śūnyo yaḥ sparśasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā

original: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sparśaṃ nitya iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. sparśam
analyzed: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sparśam nityaḥ iti vā anityam iti vā upalabhyate sparśam

original: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
analyzed: eva tatra na saṃvidyate kutas punar nityaḥ vā anityaḥ vā bhaviṣyati evam upadiśantaḥ

original: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
analyzed: kauśika te kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā na prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām upadekṣyanti

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputraṇāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca teṣām bodhisattva yānikānām kula putraṇām

original: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ

original: bhāvaya mā ca vedanām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: bhāvaya mā ca vedanām anityā iti samanupaśya tat kasya hetoḥ

original: vedanā svabhāvena śūnyā yā vedanāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā (ŚsP_II-4_228)

analyzed: punar aparam kauśika te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca teṣām bodhisattva yānikānām kula putrāṇām kula duhitṝṇām ca evam prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti

analyzed: tatra na saṃvidyate kutas punar nityaḥ vā anityaḥ vā bhaviṣyati evam upadiśantaḥ

analyzed: kauśika te kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā na prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām upadekṣyanti

analyzed: punar aparam kauśika te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca teṣām bodhisattva yānikānām kula putrāṇām

analyzed: punar aparam kauśika te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca teṣām bodhisattva yānikānām kula putrāṇām

original: bhāvaya mā ca śūnyatānimittāpranihitavimokṣamukhāny anityānīti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāyo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ saḥ abhāyaḥ yaḥ abhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni

original: nityānīti vā anityānīti vopalabhyate. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny eva tatra
analyzed: nityāni iti vā anityāni iti vā upalabhyate śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni eva tatra

analyzed: na saṃvidyate kutas punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika

analyzed: te kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā na prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām upadekṣyanti

analyzed: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā na prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikām upadekṣyanti

original: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam kauśika te kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca teṣām bodhisattva yānikānām kula putrāṇām

original: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ

original: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā smṛtyupasthāneṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,

original: te khalu punar bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmasaṃgrahaś cāmiṣasaṃgraheṇaṃ cānuś cānugṛhūnto
analyzed: te khalu punar bodhisattvam mahāsattvam dharma saṃgrahaḥ ca āmiṣa saṃgraheṇam ca anuḥ ca anugṛhūntaḥ

original: bahutaraṃ te kulaputra kuladuhitaraś ca puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti. na tv eva te paurvakāḥ
analyzed: bahutaram te kula putra kula duhitaraḥ ca puṇyam prasaviṣyanti na tu eva te paurvakāḥ

original: kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: kula putrā kula duhitaraḥ ca tat kasya hetoḥ

original: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate:

original: sādhu sādhu kauśika yas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyā utsāhaṃ dadāsi bodhisattvānām ugṛhīṣve anupārayasi,
analyzed: sādhu sādhu kauśika yaḥ tvam bodhisattvebhyaḥ utsāham dadāsi bodhisattvānām anupārayasi

original: evam eṣa tvayā kauśika karaṇīyaṃ ya āryaśrāvakaḥ sattvānām anugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām (ŚsP_II-4_269)
analyzed: evam eṣa tvayā kauśika karaṇīyam yaḥ ārya śrāvakaḥ sattvānām anugraham kartu kāmaḥ sa bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām

original: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv utsāhaṃ dadhātu dharmām iṣānugraheṇa ca bodhisattvān anugṛhātv anuparipārayatu. tat kasya hetoh?
analyzed: anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau utsāham dadhātu iṣā anugraheṇa ca bodhisattvān anugṛhātu anuparipārayatu tat kasya

original: ataḥ prasabohi kauśika bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghāḥ yad uta bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ
analyzed: atas kauśika bhagavataḥ śrāvaka saṃghāḥ yat uta bodhisattvebhyaḥ mahāsattvebhyaḥ

original: yadi ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittan notpādayan na
analyzed: yadi ca bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam na utpādayan na

original: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣeta ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ

original: nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na pratyekabuddhā prajñāparan na śrāvakāḥ,

original: yasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu danapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
